title: [Interesting Thread] Silver 4 still matches with Bronze 4 or 5 Lmao

replies.body: Been asking myself this question all season, been gold and matched with plats one game and bronze 2's the next

Could it be that you are playing during 2-4am and there aren't many people to match up with?

If we look at your matches that are during more reasonable times of the day, they are pretty balanced in terms of MMR and ranks.

The other explanation for this is dynamic queue, a low bronze queuing with a mid-high silver bringing the average down to high bronze/low silver. When I was high silver I used to play with my bronze 5 friend and our games were usually averaging bronze 2-Silver 3.

I like the [Interesting Thread] tag you added to the title... for a thread that isn't really very interesting at all, just a misunderstanding.

Food for thought? Maybe a single pea or spaghetto.
